title: PP-202, Sahiwal-VII: PTI candidate Muhammad Ghulam Sarwar defeats Nauman Langrial
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP):Muhammad Ghulam Sarwar, a candidate of Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf clinched Punjab Assemblyâ€™s PP-202, Sahiwal-VII by securing 62,298 votes.
According to the results, Malik Nauman Ahmed Langrial of Pakistan Muslim League (N) got 59,191 votes.
Umair Saleem of Tehreek-e-Labbaik Pakistan secured only 5,222 votes.The turn out remained 55.81 percent.
